name: The Pandorian Plant - Starstable Fangame
description:
You were just having a normal day in Jorvik until you came across a horse on the beach. It belongs to the Amazing Ydris who just arrived to build his circus! But there is something else going on too. The Keepers of Aideen tracked some unknown energy.

What happens next and with who and where you will end up, is in your hands.

A Visual Novel game with a romantic touch, in which you can interact with Ydris, the Soul Riders and the Dark Riders! The decisions you make will lead you to one of the 5 endings.

Visit my instagram @therese_catcamp to see more of my art and future as well as past projects of mine

There is no Mac version available right now. I thought there will be but I am having problems with creating it. If I manage to fix them, I will upload it here!
